remarks: ~ voliun is incompatible with the Feferman-Levy model; in that model, therefore, the Lebesgue measure as we've defined it isn't actually a measure.  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement:
voliunnfl.1 $e |- S = seq 1 ( + , G ) $.
voliunnfl.2 $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( vol ` ( f ` n ) ) ) $.
voliunnfl.3 $e |- ( ( A. n e. NN ( ( f ` n ) e. dom vol /\ ( vol ` ( f ` n ) ) e. RR ) /\ Disj_ n e. NN ( f ` n ) ) -> ( vol ` U_ n e. NN ( f ` n ) ) = sup ( ran S , RR* , < ) ) $.
voliunnfl $p |- ( ( A ~<_ NN /\ A. x e. A x ~<_ NN ) -> U. A =/= RR ) $.
$d A f n x $.
